author: Azure
install_msg: The AgeGate cog has been installed! Use `[p]agegateset` to configure the settings. By default, it is turned OFF.
name: AgeGate
short: Automatically bans new accounts based on age, with temporary or permanent ban options.
description: Helps protect against raids by automatically banning users whose accounts are newer than a configurable age in days. The ban can be set to be permanent or temporary for a configurable number of days. The ban reason is customizable and the entire feature can be toggled on or off per server. You may also notify only.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores server-specific settings. If temporary bans are used, it also stores the user ID and unban timestamp for temporarily banned users until they are unbanned. This data is deleted upon unbanning.
